entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight.
